items.title: WW1 vet honoured

• **Event Date**: Recent (exact date not specified).
• **Location**: Survey Regiment's headquarters.
• **Action**: Soldiers' club renamed to **Ingram VC Club** in his honor.
• **Recognition**: Acknowledgment of Ingram's contributions and valor.

items.title: Niggers!

• Ongoing research examines long-term effects on populations.

items.title: South Australian land exploration, 1856 to 1880 / by Bessie Threadgill

• **State Rivalry**: Tensions arose between states due to competition for resources and economic opportunities.
• **Economic Impact**: Gold mining and pastoralism significantly influenced settlement patterns and state development.

items.title: The Gold Coast transformed : from wilderness to urban ecosystem / editors: Tor Hundloe, Bridgette McDougall, and Craig Page
items.snippet: Gold Coast Transformed From Wilderness to Urban Ecosystem [electronic resource], The Gold Coast transformed : from wilderness to urban ecosystem /, pythons: the wildlife of the Gold Coast; Wildlife in the suburbs; Some hazards for urban wildlife; Lack of, Energy -- 14. The Gold Coast Business Sector: Meeting the Environmental Challenge -- 15. Planning for the
bullets: • **Title**: "Gold Coast Transformed: From Wilderness to Urban Ecosystem"
• **Focus**: Transition of the Gold Coast from natural wilderness to urban environment.
• **Wildlife**: Highlights include pythons and suburban wildlife hazards.
• **Environmental Challenges**: Discusses the Gold Coast business sector's response to environmental issues.
• **Planning**: Emphasizes the need for strategic planning for urban wildlife management.
• **Publication Type**: Electronic resource.
• **Scope**: Covers ecological impacts and urban development strategies.
